alert.note: Alert for Dunn; Pepin; Pierce (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 19 at 10:33PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Goodhue, east central Rice, Pepin, eastern Pierce and southwestern Dunn Counties through 1115 PM CDT... At 1033 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles west of Elmwood to near Welch to near Nerstrand. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Elmwood and Plum City around 1040 PM CDT. Bay City around 1045 PM CDT. Wanamingo, Eau Galle and Frontenac around 1050 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Zumbrota, Durand, Goodhue, Stockholm and Pepin. This includes U.S. Highway 61 between mile markers 82 and 100. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for southeastern Minnesota...and west central Wisconsin.
